name: 陳柏全
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
自動控制數學基礎，物理系統的數學模式，控制器的種類，時域分析，穩定性分析，根軌跡法，頻率領域的分析，控制系統的設計。
schedule:
1,2　　Dynamic Models
3　　Review of Laplace Transform
4　　Effect of Pole and Zero Locations
5　　Routh's Stability Criterion
6,7　　Basic Properties of Feedback 
8      First Midterm Exam
9　　Guidelines for Sketching a Root Locus
10　　Root Locus Examples
11　　Dynamic Compensations - Rootlocus
12　　Dynamic Compensations - Rootlocus (for complex systems)
13　　Second Midterm Exam
14　　Frequency Response
15　　Bode Plot
16　　Nyquist Criterion and Stability Margin
17　　Dynamic Compensations – Frequency Resp.
18　　Final Exam
scorePolicy: 分組作業簡報 30%、期中考 35%、期末考 35%
materials: Feedback Control of Dynamic Systems, 8th Edition, by Gene F. Franklin, J. David Powell, and Abbas Emami-Naeini, Pearson Education.
remarks:
